articles.author: Boureima Balima, Felix Onuah
articles.title: West Africa's ultimatum to Niger coup leaders nears deadline - Reuters
articles.description: West African nations were to determine on Friday a potential intervention if Niger's coup is not overturned by the weekend after mediation failed in a crisis rattling global powers.
articles.content: NIAMEY/ABUJA, Aug 4 (Reuters) - West African nations were to determine on Friday a potential intervention if Niger's coup is not overturned by the weekend after mediation failed in a crisis rattling … [+4092 chars]
